PrecisRegulations Amending the STREAMLINED ACCOUNTING (GST/HST) REGULATIONS which allow designated charities to use the "Special Quick Method" of accounting for public service bodies to determine the amount of tax payable.

precis:
Regulations Amending the STREAMLINED ACCOUNTING (GST/HST) REGULATIONS which
allow designated charities to use the "Special Quick Method" of accounting
for public service bodies to determine the amount of tax payable.
